parameters.name: BAllConfig
parameters.description: True to apply texture to this feature all configurations, false to apply texture to this feature in the configuration specified in config_name only

title: IFeature.SetTexture
description: Applies texture to this feature in either all configurations or only the specified configuration.
signature:
System.Boolean SetTexture( 
   System.Boolean
BAllConfig
,
   System.String
Config_name
,
   Texture
TextureIn
)

parameters.name: BAllConfig
parameters.description: True to apply texture to this feature all configurations, false to apply texture to this feature in the configuration specified in config_name only

returns: True if texture is applied, false if not
